query:
SELECT pt.id, pt.customerId, pt.amount, pt.status, pt.txid, pt.createdAt, pt.paidAt, c.pin 
FROM pix_transactions pt 
JOIN customers c ON pt.customerId = c.id 
WHERE c.pin = 7 AND pt.amount = 233
ORDER BY pt.createdAt DESC
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.root --database 2KeMNLvGvAyUJv9AEWkrsw --execute SELECT pt.id, pt.customerId, pt.amount, pt.status, pt.txid, pt.createdAt, pt.paidAt, c.pin 
FROM pix_transactions pt 
JOIN customers c ON pt.customerId = c.id 
WHERE c.pin = 7 AND pt.amount = 233
ORDER BY pt.createdAt DESC
